title: Troubleman on MySpace and Facebook
content:
MySpace page has been updated.  
 [http://www.myspace.com/troublemantheband](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016234918/http:/www.myspace.com/troublemantheband "http://www.myspace.com/troublemantheband")  
We need friends! :D

Facebook page has been created.  
 [http://www.facebook.com/pages/Troubleman/8599842637](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016234918/http:/www.facebook.com/pages/Troubleman/8599842637 "http://www.facebook.com/pages/Troubleman/8599842637")  
We need fans! ;)

Website _badly_ needs to be updated. :P

Further updates as events warrant.
author: Bald Condensed
